nav.div: Jefferson County Schools » About Us » JCS COVID-19 Response » JCS Pandemic FAQ

img.alt: Large nickel with blue lettering and a yellow line
img.title: Large nickel with blue lettering and a yellow line

div.span:
The unprecedented disruption of the COVID-19 Pandemic has created many changes for Jefferson County Schools. Some of those changes are harder to answer than others, but it all begins with good information. These Frequently Asked Questions are the start of what will be an ongoing project to keep everyone informed about what is happening for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year.
If you have a question you would like included in a future update of this FAQ, please CLICK HERE.

div.p: © 2019 Jefferson County Schools. All Rights Reserved.
